title: No, Grand Tour Racing Is Not Better without Tadej Pogačar
content:
Opinion: The Vuelta a España was a wide-open thrill-ride in the absence of Pogačar and Vingegaard. But grand tour racing will be all the better when they're back.

Read the full article at No, Grand Tour Racing Is Not Better without Tadej Pogačar on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
